name: unexpected-exif
description: EXIF plugin for the Unexpected assertion library

scripts.ci: npm test && npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run generate-site
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --all -- npm test && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.generate-site: generate-site --require ./bootstrap-unexpected-markdown.js && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build/assertions/string/to-have-EXIF-data-satisfying/ && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build/assertions/Buffer/to-have-EXIF-data-satisfying/

author: Andreas Lind <andreaslindpetersen@gmail.com>
